ygData.subject: To the Autobots
ygData.msgSnippet: Back in the Shadow Destiny, Belthassan was slowly getting back from his renewal. He was again able to move freely around the base without his sister s help.

Subject: To the Autobots
Message-ID: <9p32fe+ih66@...>

Back in the Shadow Destiny, Belthassan was slowly getting back from 
his renewal. He was again able to move freely around the base without 
his sister's help. However, he had gotten no response from the 
Autobots. Meanwhile, Tankor and Thrust came back from their patrol.

Melchana:
Tankor, Thrust, follow me in the Matrix Chamber, and be seated.
Now, rookies, I will teach you the art of transformation. Focus your 
minds on nothingness. Reach the balance between rage and peacefulness. 
Find the point of equilibrium, and feel the matrix penetrate your 
spark...

The two new Tripredacus closed their eyes... and soon glowed.

Tankor&Thrust: We are... transformed...

They both changed to robot mode, Tankor being a massive spiked warrior 
and Thrust an agile scout.

Belthassan had seen the scene and looked positively surprised.

Belthassan: Very good, both of you! Now, I shall try to contact the 
Autobots again. Thrust, please go see if Daemos's state is getting any 
better.

Thrust: Affirmative.

Belthassan: Prophecy, open a frequency with the Autobot base; 
Autobots, I am Belthassan, commander of the Tripredacus. We wish to 
speak with you. One of our member is on his way to your location.
